name: The Little Hallway
description:
Hallway, hallway,

In the dark and lonely,

Hallway, hallway.

Between life and death, a crossway,

Do you hear her?

y o u c a n h e a r h e r c a l l i n g r i g h t ?

p l e h  g n i y d   s'ehs

r e h

A short, horror experience made for a halloween game jam, but wasn't finished in time due to various IRL stuff. Takes inspiration from PT, with the quality you can expect from a gamejam level game.

Prepare for spooky hallways, music, weird imagery, loud noises and a little tingle down your spine...
